short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect your own custom set of keywords in Github or Azure pull requests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you specify custom keywords which can be detected within pull request files. The occurrences of these keywords can also easily be stepped through. This includes searches based on a portion of text or full words.

This allows you to easily detect code smells and code violations.
